item.description:
Ok, you requested it, so let's give a weeknight movie a shot.

The Kids Are All Right edged out Inception in the voting, so I've chosen the 6:50 showing Weds. night at the Kendall Sq. Cinema. (See this page for a map and directions.)

After the movie we can head somewhere nearby (such as the Cambridge Brewing Company, Tommy Doyle's, or The Friendly Toast) for an adult beverage, snack, and spirited discussion of the movie.

Finding the group

If it's nice out, I'll wait outside the theater near the bike rack that faces the box office.

If it's not nice out, I'll wait just past the ticket kiosk machines, which are on the right side of the first floor underneath the stairs.

I don't have Meetup stuff so, to be conspicuous, I'll wear a Meetup-red retro bowling shirt. (Also, I wear glasses.)

To meet up and get decent seats in the theater, please try to arrive w/ enough time to get your ticket and join the group by 6:30. We'll likely head into the theater shortly afterward.

If you miss the group before the movie, I'll wait in the left side aisle of the theater during the credits so that anyone may join the group then.
item.name: A Weeknight Movie - The Kids Are All Right
